name: Better Translate App
description:
I use google translate quite a bit and I always think of ways that i would tweak the looks and features of the app. I finally made those tweaks and here they are haha.


I mostly love how the app works but I am often switching between translating to and from english and making the switch button bigger, more obvious, and more tappable, there are just a couple other small tweaks.


I'd love to see your remix of this app and see how you would do things differently!


Medium Article: https://medium.com/@38briton/a-better-translate-app-9e221ed6caef
